segments.text: Where are you going this weekend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh really ? It ’ ll be nice and warm there . Have you been there before ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , actually it ’ s my second visit . I was there last October .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . What ’ s it like there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , the life style is much more relaxed than here in the city . And the seafood is tastier !
segments.speaker: S2
